reviews.text: Lots of great stuff for really good prices. Huge variety too as it is a super store. Amazing range of vegan options I dont think I've seen that many in any other stores at all. Good for students too as there is lots of cheap ready meals, pot noodles, bulk and tinned stuff etc.

Another Asda. Great shop with great prices. It has a dedicated car park on top of its, so you won't need to worry about finding a place to park. It's also located near a shopping centre, so it's a great place to go to.

Happy shopping here always since we used to live in erith now moved. Loads of selection to choose from I just use self checkout it’s very easy self service. Loads of tolls and options. But 4 stars not 5 is because bottled water by Asda is never in stock always shelf empty and I’ve been coming here since 2018…

I was in Asda, Bexleyheath today and to my dismay there were more staff not wearing masks than staff that were wearing masks. Most of those that were wearing masks had them over their chins and not covering their mouths or noses. There was also a large number of customers not wearing masks yet not challenged by staff. I understand they can be uncomfortable but when there are signs telling everyone to wear masks why do the staff feel it does not apply to them. It's very disappointing  to see this with the way  things are  at the moment, one thing that cheered me up was watching an Asda TV ad telling us how all their staff wear masks and ask customers to do the same.

Very lovely man called bamil made our pizza for us today been getting one made every Friday normally for years now and never hand someone as helpful friendly and make us exactly what we have asked for happy to help and with a smile on his face

Horrible and incredibly expensive through Uber Eats. Cookie dough came crammed into a plastic container, barley a full portion, covered in way too much white chocolate sauce. It was cold by the time it arrived and didn't even taste nice. Normally the desserts in Creams tend to be really nice, but I definitely would not recommend ordering it for delivery, I will not be ordering again.
Even though they were busy the service and staff were great. Special mention goes to Kira. We will be back

Very dirty, the entrance is full of deliveroo drivers, slow service. I feel like they are more interested in the online orders more than how they serve the customers in their shop. Will never be going into another Creams Cafe again. Very disappointing.

Took forever to be served and seemed like we were forgotten, however all 4 stars go to the member of staff who was discerning of the extra long wait. I didn't get his name but he was the guy with the lovely locs. Thank you!!

Ordered delivery via deliveroo - took an hour to deliver first of all. Main point is, missing dessert item which was for my daughter - fine, tried calling to let them know and rectify, literally no answer after 8 attempts. Given up - will contact Deliveroo directly for a credit. Will not order from them again because this isn't the first time they've missed off items.

I had a great experience here. I needed tea, I explained my milk requirements to the girl and she was brilliant, really understanding and sympathetic to my needs. Very friendly and on the level, i felt so welcomed. Best costumer service ive had for a while, and the tea weren't too bad either. Top marks.

I drove over 12miles today for this amazing place, only place in recommend. Next door is The 8 Burger which has the best burgers and chips. Honestly the best combo and I can’t recommend these guys enough. The customer service is out of this world. You have to try it for yourself, you won’t regret it.
Great selection, really lovely staff, visit here at least once a month l, even if its just for a coffee with a friend.  Much better than a purple themed competitor down the road!!
Lovely place, cheaper than creams, lovely deserts and service was good, nice and clean environment
All the staffs are very polite,friendly and helpful. Deserts are freshly prepared and tasty.
